info.name: Agra
info.attribution:
Room layout and design by LawDawg and released to the public domain by CC0. Game piece icons are available as follows: From https://game-icons.net/ and available under CC BY 3.0: Delapouite - Jug https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/jug.html - Grain https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/grain.html - Gold https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/gold-stack.html - Camel https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/camel.html - Camel head https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/camel-head.html - Palace https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/indian-palace.html Lucas - Shirt https://game-icons.net/1x1/lucasms/shirt.html Lorc - Chest https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/locked-chest.html - Diamond https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/cut-diamond.html - Coins https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/cash.html Taj Mahal victory chip icon by Freepik available under the FlatIcon license at https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/taj-mahal_760023 Aladin Font by Sudtipos available under Open Font License, Version 1.1 from https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Aladin?query=aladin. Library image generated using the Midjourney artificial intelligence image generator, https://www.midjourney.com/home/, using the following prompt: "taj mahal watercolor painting --ar 1:1 --v 5.1 "
info.description: Players take turns either taking cards from common market area or selling cards in exchange for 6 different goods tokens worth varying points. Play until card pile is depleted or 3 types of goods are depleted. Most points at end of round wins the round. First to win 2 rounds is overall winner.
info.helpText:
Players take seats. Press restart button in upper right to begin game. After each player's turn, press skip-next button to advance turn indicator and auto-fill market with 5 cards. Each player can only see the count of camel cards for themself. After trading cards for resources, drag cards discard holder and the resource tokens to the scoring holder area near the sigma button for your seat.

At end of round, determine which player gets the camel bonus and drag the camel icon to the scoring holder area. Each player press the sigma/sum button to calculate and show score. Drag victory point token to circle holder by player name and press restart button to go to next round.

fields.text: Check the box below to completely reset the board and start a new game. Leave the box unchecked to continue to the next round.

fields.label: Check box to start new game and choose a random starting player.
